title: Alpine appears to not be ignoring the request to build without fontconfig
body:
**Description of Change**

Fix the checks for dependencies and not use fontconfig

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1341

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
